mapper.select: select se_customer.customer_name, se_customer.customer_type, se_customer.telephone, se_customer.belong_company, se_label.label_name, se_customer.enter_pool_date from se_communication left join se_customer on se_communication.customer_id = se_customer.id left join se_customer_label_relation on se_customer.id = se_customer_label_relation.customer_id left join se_label on se_customer_label_relation.label_id = se_label.id where se_communication.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into se_communication_log (communication_id, communication_way, communication_content, communication_time) values(#{communicationId}, #{communicationWay}, #{communicationContent}, #{communicationTime})

choose.when: update se_communication set visit_times = visit_times + 1 where id = #{id}
update se_communication set call_times = call_times + 1 where id = #{id}
update se_communication set msg_times = msg_times + 1 where id = #{id}
update se_communication set wx_times = wx_times + 1 where id = #{id}

mapper.update: update se_communication_log set communication_id = #{communicationId}, communication_way = #{communicationWay}, communication_content = #{communicationContent}, communication_time = #{communicationTime} where id = #{id}

choose.when: update se_communication set visit_times = visit_times - 1 where id = #{id}
update se_communication set call_times = call_times - 1 where id = #{id}
update se_communication set msg_times = msg_times - 1 where id = #{id}
update se_communication set wx_times = wx_times - 1 where id = #{id}
